code: import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import Books from'./books.js';import Auth from'./auth.js';import Issues from'./issues.js';import Users from'./users.js';var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;export var ConfigureStore=function ConfigureStore(){var store=createStore(combineReducers({books:Books,auth:Auth,issues:Issues,users:Users}),composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunk)));return store;};
